survey_name: Employee Engagement and Remote Work Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee engagement and satisfaction with remote work arrangements, focusing on work-life balance, productivity, and communication tools.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current remote work arrangement?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with clear radio button options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current remote work arrangement?

questions.question_text: Which of the following tools do you use for remote work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes), with an open-text field for 'Other' option.

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face while working remotely?
